meanings.sent1: The old book had a damaged cover.
meanings.sent2: The damaged car was in need of repair.
meanings.sent3: The damaged toy made the child sad.
meanings.sent4: Her trust in him was as damaged as the broken vase.
meanings.sent5: The storm left a trail of damaged houses in its wake.

meanings.sent1: The damaged fruit was not fit to eat.
meanings.sent2: The damaged reputation of the company needed rebuilding.
meanings.sent3: The damaged cake was a disappointment at the party.
meanings.sent4: His pride was as damaged as the torn painting.
meanings.sent5: The rain damaged the picnic plans, leaving everyone disappointed.

meanings.sent1: The damaged bridge could not support heavy vehicles.
meanings.sent2: The damaged economy needed time to recover.
meanings.sent3: The damaged tree looked like it needed a hug.
meanings.sent4: His spirit felt as damaged as the worn-out shoes.
meanings.sent5: The relationship was damaged beyond repair, causing heartache for both.
